backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated textual summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme color variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML shell including boot fallback loader, metadata, and mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health‑check page showing system status, environment info, and guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring ThemeProvider, Web3Provider, ErrorBoundary, and Dashboard, and dispatching an app-mounted event.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Displays BNB and token balances with refresh, live update toggling, error handling, and valuation integration.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays contract address, owner address, and BSC network info with clipboard copy actions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Handles BNB and token deposits into the vault, including validation, transaction sending, and history logging.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build and environment info with options to copy diagnostics and performance data to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI with error details and recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with branding, build version, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays app branding and provides a theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Provides a token selector or manual entry field using saved token catalogs and popover search.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: UI component that displays, formats, and clears stored transaction history with status icons and BscScan links.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Wallet connection UI handling MetaMask availability, network switching, and mobile/desktop fallback instructions.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form for withdrawing BNB or tokens from the vault, validating input, executing withdrawals, and logging history entries.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Type declaration extending the Window object with Ethereum provider fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous IC actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices and computes USD/BNB valuations for on-chain balances.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, persistence, and AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that Web3 replaces backend queries.
Manages a persistent map of token addresses to user-defined labels using localStorage, with normalization and fallback display labels. Provides methods to set, remove, and retrieve labels plus dropdown option formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata (symbol, decimals, name) in localStorage with versioning. Supports get/set, clearing entries, and automatic persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores transaction history in localStorage and polls BSC RPC or provider for receipt updates. Supports adding entries, clearing history, and tracking pending statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and caches BNB and token balances from the vault with polling, timeout protection, and metadata retrieval. Manages balance state, errors, and live updates for watched tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and stores the vault owner address using contract calls. Exposes loading, error state, and a refetch function.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal operations for tokens and BNB by constructing and sending encoded contract calls. Tracks deposit/withdraw action state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent list of normalized watched token addresses in localStorage with validation. Supports adding, removing, and checking tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Provides a React context for Web3 state, wallet connection, BSC network switching, and contract interaction helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Exports app branding constants and helpers for retrieving app names and identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Stores static build metadata and utilities to retrieve version, date, and deployed build ID.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Contains contract address, function signatures, and utilities for encoding and decoding EVM contract calls.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Implements low-level EVM helpers for address validation, ABI encoding/decoding, and unit conversion.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Provides browser‑safe ABI string decoding utilities for ERC‑20 metadata like symbol and name.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Collects build and browser performance metrics and formats them for display or export.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and token prices from CoinGecko and formats numeric price values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with wallet connection handling, balance views, and deposit/withdraw operations gated by BSC network status.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements related to wallet connection visibility and fixing stuck balance refresh behavior.
